summary: Circlets that count as Light and Heavy Armors
descriptionHtml:
This is a standalone mod that adds 10 craftable circlets that are considered as light armors, and 7 that count as heavy armors.  So the Custom Fit and Matching Set perks will work while you are wearing these circlets.

All circlets can be crafted at the forge, and have a base armor value of 8.  However they cannot be improved further via smithing*, so it is basically a tradeoff between looking and protection.

* An optional version that allows upgrade of the circlet (dependent on the relevant smithing perks) is now available.

Available Circlets
-----------------------
Light:
Tafiir - Light - Khajiit(?)
Sivaas - Hide
Raan - Leather
Ruvaak - Scaled
Fahliil - Elven
Klo - Glass
Dov - Dragonscale
Vokun - Dark Brotherhood
Om - Nightingale
Vulon - Nightingale

Heavy:
Fus - Iron
Dwiin - Steel Plate
Ogiim - Orcish
Gol - Dwarven
Ved - Ebony
Toor - Daedric
Qeth - Dragonbone
